devConsole.codespace_info: A Github Codespace is available to help in development
devConsole.mqtt_topic_info: Omit the 'base_topic', frontend messages are sent over WebSocket directly to Zigbee2MQTT.
devConsole.state_property_info: Set the result into the device's state (only for read)

health.interview_info: Dispositivo interviews can heavily influence this data.

network.begin_info_display: The display type allows to switch between a data-oriented view and a map view.
network.begin_info_routes: Enabling routes will retrieve the routes table from devices (not all coordinators/devices support this, but failures should not prevent the rest of the data from loading). This is currently only used in the 'data' display.
network.begin_info_type: The type is used to retrieve a different network map format. External ones are meant to be copied for use outside of the frontend (some example websites are given once generated).
network.copy_paste_on: Copy and paste the following data in one of the available online viewers/editors.
network.highlight_info: Click on a device's image to highlight it automatically.
network.legend_edge_toggle: Toggling relationship edges will change the layout. When disabling one or more, the actual layout of the network is no longer accurately represented.
network.legend_node_fold: Node context menu fold/expand button will affect the depending part of the network.
network.legend_node_select: Selecting a node will select the depending one-hop part of the network.
network.legend_node_siblings: Only highest-rated siblings are shown, which should roughly match the actual connections of the network.
network.loading: Dependendo do tamanho da rede e da qualidade de seus links, isso pode demorar um pouco.

ota.schedule_info: Will update on next OTA request from device
ota.update_selected_info: An OTA update is very taxing for a network. Make sure it is stable and opt for less used times.

settings.donation_text: Aqui você pode nos agradecer por todo o trabalho árduo. Não hesite em dizer algo legal também ;)
settings.frontend_notice: Essas configurações são armazenadas localmente no seu navegador. Usar janelas privadas ou limpar o cache irá redefini-las para os padrões.
settings.translation_prompt: Você pode ajudar com a tradução em

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for: Caminho absoluto para certificado SSL/TLS para autenticação do cliente
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of: Caminho absoluto para certificado SSL/TLS da CA usado para assinar certificados de servidor e cliente
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-: Caminho absoluto para chave SSL/TLS para autenticação do cliente

g.2 for CC2531 or 16 for CC26X2R1) (defau: Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 or 16 for CC26X2R1) (default: null, uses recommended value)

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter type, not needed unless you are: Tipo do adaptador, não necessário a menos que você esteja enfrentando problemas
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messag: Adicionar atributo last_seen às mensagens MQTT, contém data/hora da última mensagem Zigbee
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT message: Adicionar atributo elapsed às mensagens MQTT, contém milissegundos desde a mensagem anterior

Allow only certain devices to join the n.Note that all devices not on the passli: Allow only certain devices to join the network (by ieeeAddr). Note that all devices not on the passlist will be removed from the network!

g.'http://localhost:8080/z2m', set this t: Base URL for the frontend. If hosted under a subpath, e.g. 'http://localhost:8080/z2m', set this to '/z2m'

This must match what the firmware on yo: Baud rate speed for the serial port. This must match what the firmware on your adapter supports (most commonly 115200).

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Checks whether devices are online/offlin: Verifica se os dispositivos estão online/offline

Control when to publish state OFF or CLO.'all_members_off': only publish state O: Control when to publish state OFF or CLOSE for a group. 'all_members_off': only publish state OFF/CLOSE when all group members are in state OFF/CLOSE,  'last_member_state': publish state OFF whenever one of its members changes to OFF

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Create symlink to current logs in the lo: Criar symlink para logs atuais no diretório de log
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Debounces messages of this device: Faz debounce de mensagens deste dispositivo
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable LED of the adapter if supported: Desabilitar LED do adaptador se suportado

AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Clo.Enabling will break the Home Assistant: Disable retain for all send messages. ONLY enable if your MQTT broker doesn't support retained message (e.g. AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT core, IBM Watson IoT Platform). Enabling will break the Home Assistant integration

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disables the device (excludes device fro: Desabilita o dispositivo (exclui dispositivo de scans de rede, disponibilidade e atualizações de estado de grupo)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Do not log these namespaces (regex-based: Não logar estes namespaces (baseado em regex) para nível debug

5, x3, x6, x12.): Habilitar timeout backoff on failed availability pings (x1.5, x3, x6, x12...)

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Examples when 'state' of a device is pub: Exemplos quando 'state' de um dispositivo é publicado json: tópico: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' payload '{"state": "ON"}' attribute: tópico 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' payload 'ON' attribute_and_json: tanto json quanto attribute (veja acima)

Filter attributes with regex from being: Filter attributes with regex from being added to the cache, this prevents the attribute from being in the published payload when the value didn't change.

(This has no effect if optimistic is se: Filter attributes with regex from optimistic publish payload when calling /set. (This has no effect if optimistic is set to false).

Filter attributes with regex from publis: Filter attributes with regex from published payload.

Binds to a unix socket when an absolute: Frontend binding host. Binds to a unix socket when an absolute path is given instead.

Frontend binding port.Ignored when using a unix domain socket: Frontend binding port. Ignored when using a unix domain socket

Example: 'z2m: Failed to ping.*': Hide frontend notifications matching specified regex strings. Example: 'z2m: Failed to ping.*'

The events and attributes are currently: Home Assistant experimental event entities, when enabled Zigbee2MQTT will add event entities for exposed actions. The events and attributes are currently deemed experimental and subject to change.

Home Assistant legacy actions sensor, wh: Home Assistant legacy actions sensor, when enabled a action sensor will be discoverd and an empty `action` will be send after every published action.

Host to indicate that log messages are c: Host to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).

If true, the frontend UI is not served,: If true, the frontend UI is not served, only the WebSocket is maintained by Zigbee2MQTT (you are required to serve a standalone UI yourself as needed).

If true, will reset stats every time the: If true, will reset stats every time the health check is executed (only applicable to stats that can be reset).

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Include device information to mqtt messa: Incluir informações do dispositivo em mensagens MQTT

You can increase this value if your net: Limits the rate of requests (in milliseconds) during OTA updates to reduce network congestion. You can increase this value if your network appears unstable during OTA.

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Location of override OTA index file: Localização do arquivo de índice OTA de substituição

Location of the adapter.To autodetect the port, set null: Location of the adapter. To autodetect the port, set null

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Log debug level to MQTT and frontend (ma: Logar nível debug para MQTT e frontend (pode diminuir performance geral)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Log file name, can also contain timestam: Nome do arquivo de log, também pode conter timestamp
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT base topic for Zigbee2MQTT MQTT mes: Tópico base MQTT para mensagens MQTT do Zigbee2MQTT

MQTT message payload will contain all at.Has to be true when integrating via Hom: MQTT message payload will contain all attributes, not only changed ones. Has to be true when integrating via Home Assistant

settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TL: URL do servidor MQTT (use mqtts:// para conexão SSL/TLS)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server authentication password: Senha de autenticação do servidor MQTT
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server authentication user: Usuário de autenticação do servidor MQTT
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Maximum jitter (in msec) allowed on time: Jitter máximo (em msec) permitido no timeout para evitar que pings de disponibilidade tentem disparar ao mesmo tempo
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Name of the device in Home Assistant: Nome do dispositivo no Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Network encryption key, changing require: Chave de criptografia da rede, alterar requer re-pareamento de todos os dispositivos!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Number of log directories to keep before: Número de diretórios de log a manter antes de deletar o mais antigo
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Options for active devices (routers/main: Opções para dispositivos ativos (roteadores/alimentados pela rede)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Options for passive devices (mostly batt: Opções para dispositivos passivos (principalmente alimentados por bateria)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Output location of the log, leave empty: Localização de saída do log, deixe vazio para suprimir logging

pid): PID of the process that log messages are coming from (Default process.pid).

A value of zero disables pausing: Pause availability pings when backoff reaches over this limit until a new Zigbee message is received from the device. A value of zero disables pausing.

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Periodically check the health of Zigbee2: Verificar periodicamente a saúde do Zigbee2MQTT
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Persist cached state, only used when cac: Persistir estado em cache, usado apenas quando cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Protects unique payload values of specif: Protege valores únicos de payload de propriedades especificadas de sobrescrita dentro do tempo de debounce
settingsSchemaDescriptions.QoS level for MQTT messages of this devi: Nível QoS para mensagens MQTT deste dispositivo
settingsSchemaDescriptions.QoS level for MQTT messages of this grou: Nível QoS para mensagens MQTT deste grupo
settingsSchemaDescriptions.RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for seri: Controle de Fluxo de Hardware RTS / CTS para porta serial

The sibling property 'ssl_key' must be: SSL Certificate file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_key' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.

The sibling property 'ssl_cert' must be: SSL key file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_cert' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Send cached state on startup, only used: Enviar estado em cache na inicialização, usado apenas quando cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Set individual log levels for certain na: Definir níveis de log individuais para certos namespaces

Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds,.version to 5: Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds, Make sure to set mqtt.version to 5

NOTE: The same value exists in your MQT: Specifies the maximum allowed packet length (in bytes) that the server can send to Zigbee2MQTT. NOTE: The same value exists in your MQTT broker but for the length the client can send to it instead.

The end of line character to be added to: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Message without modifications).

The host running syslogd, defaults to lo: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost.

The minimum time between payloads in sec.Payloads received whilst the device is: The minimum time between payloads in seconds. Payloads received whilst the device is being throttled will be discarded

The name of the application (Default: Zi: The name of the application (Default: Zigbee2MQTT).

tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, e: The network protocol to log over (e.g. tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, etc).

/dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X): The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).

The port on the host that syslog is runn: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port.

Note: This value may get ignored for ma: The size of file chunks sent during an update (in bytes). Note: This value may get ignored for manufacturers that require specific values.

The type of the syslog protocol to use (: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD, also valid: 5424).

png): The user-defined device icon for the frontend. It can be a full URL link to an image (e.g. https://SOME.SITE/MODEL123.jpg) or a path to a local file inside the `device_icons` directory (e.g. device_icons/MODEL123.png).

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an active device will b: Tempo após o qual um dispositivo ativo será marcado como offline em minutos
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an passive device will: Tempo após o qual um dispositivo passivo será marcado como offline em minutos
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Transmit power of adapter, only availabl: Potência de transmissão do adaptador, disponível apenas para adaptadores Z-Stack (CC253*/CC2652/CC1352), CC2652 = 5dbm, CC1352 máx = 20dbm (5dbm padrão)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.URL on which the frontend can be reached: URL na qual o frontend pode ser acessado, atualmente usado apenas para a página de configuração de dispositivo Home Assistant

Used in the MQTT topic of a device.By default this is the device ID: Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By default this is the device ID

The value is set in minutes, and the de: Your device may request a check for a new firmware update. This value determines how frequently third party servers may actually be contacted to look for firmware updates. The value is set in minutes, and the default is 1 day.

settingsSchemaDescriptions.ZigBee pan ID, changing requires re-pair: ZigBee pan ID, alterar requer re-pareamento de todos os dispositivos!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee channel, changing might require r: Canal Zigbee, alterar pode requerer re-pareamento de alguns dispositivos! (Nota: use um canal ZLL: 11, 15, 20, ou 25 para evitar problemas)

If you disable these device initiated c: Zigbee devices may request a firmware update, and do so frequently, causing Zigbee2MQTT to reach out to third party servers. If you disable these device initiated checks, you can still initiate a firmware update check manually.

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee extended pan ID, changing require: Zigbee pan ID estendido, alterar requer re-pareamento de todos os dispositivos!

zigbee.force_remove_notice: Use apenas como último recurso (não será propagado para a rede)
zigbee.read_write_attributes: Read / Write attributes from endpoint cluster
